George G. Brown letter to John L. Rider regarding Brooklyn Board of Education allotment of funds
George G. Brown letter to John L. Rider regarding Brooklyn Board of Education allotment of funds
An 1895 letter sent from George G. Brown, Secretary of the Brooklyn Department of Public Instruction, to John L. Rider, Supervisor of Flatlands, regarding Flatlands School District No. 2.
An 1895 letter sent from George G. Brown, Secretary of the Brooklyn Department of Public Instruction, to John L. Rider, Supervisor of Flatlands, regarding Flatlands School District No. 2.
Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.). Dept. of Public Instruction
Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.). Dept. of Public Instruction
Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.). Dept. of Public Instruction

Letter sent from George G. Brown, Secretary of the Brooklyn Department of Public Instruction, to John L. Rider, Supervisor of Flatlands, regarding the Brooklyn Board of Education allotting $342.00 to the the trustees of Flatlands School District No. 2. The letter is dated July 10, 1895.
Gift of Mrs. E. Lamberson, 1955.
